settings.question: How does the sleep trial phase work?
settings.answer: It's simple. You can test the Emma mattress for 365 days to decide whether or not you are satisfied with our product. If you realize that Emma is not the right mattress for you, simply contact our customer service team (support@emma-sleep.ca or 1-833-366-2872). We will give you a refund for 100% of the purchase price. However, we do ask that you give yourself time to get used to your new mattress so we recommend testing your Emma for at least 3 - 4 weeks before sending it back.

settings.question: Shouldn't I first test a mattress in person before purchasing?
settings.answer: We believe that our mattresses provides the perfect night's sleep for 99% of our customers. The mattress industry is aimed at confusing customers with excess supply, pushy sales tactics and high prices. We want to make sure your mattress buying experience is as simple and carefree as possible. That is why we offer our customers the chance to test the Emma mattress for 365 days risk-free. If you do not enjoy it, just simply call or email us and we’ll pick it up free of charge

settings.question: When does the sleep trial start?
settings.answer: It starts on the day of delivery. From the day you receive your Emma Mattress, you can test it risk-free for 365 days.

settings.question: Does the mattress have to stay in plastic wrap during the trial?
settings.answer: No, it doesn’t. We want you to have the best sleep possible and that should not include sleeping on noisy plastic. The Emma mattress is vacuum sealed in plastic and roll packed for delivery to your home. Upon receiving your new Emma mattress, carefully remove the plastic using a pair of scissors. A guideline for how to properly unwrap your Emma is provided in your package as well. Within a few minutes, your mattress will magically self-inflate and will be ready for you to sleep on.

settings.question: How can I return my Emma mattress within the trial time?
settings.answer: When you want to return your Emma Mattress, simply call our customer service team and we will arrange for pickup. The mattress will be picked up by our return partner at zero cost to you. You will receive a refund within 14 days of pickup.
